name: Camtasia macOS Project
summary: A CMPROJ file is a project created by the macOS version of TechSmith Camtasia, a screen recording and video editing application. It contains all the imported media files, video edits, timeline properties, and project settings. Camtasia users save projects as CMPROJ files when creating and editing their videos, then export them to other formats to share them.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
